entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegisterHostOutputs #74753
  • Use the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package for the System.Index/System.Range implementation downlevel #74752
  • API: `Conversion.IsSpan` #74738
  • Source Generators and Analyzers extensibility #74737
  • "IDE0018 Variable declaration can be inlined" missing in top-level statements #74736
    Backlog
  • Params collection in collection expression's .Add method causes crash by StackOverflow #74734
  • Params collection as AppendLiteral parameter causes crash #74733

Closed

  • Support attributes in SymbolDisplayParameterOptions #74742

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable build on test refresh #74751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Use existing property to access services #74749
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge "first-class Span types" feature into main #74732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add `Conversion.IsSpan` public API #74731
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Expose document symbols to Razor cohosting #74730
    VSCode
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to primary constructor #74748
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix some small things with readme #74709
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Send a TextDocumentidentifier for razor dynamic file requests/responses #74727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Avoid async void methods #74744
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch API to immutable-array from params-array #74741
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix URI comparisons for different casing #74746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove implicit unsafe cast in foreach #74747
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unnecessary type for wrapping analyzer references. #74739
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Some minor renames/cleanup before an upcoming large refactoring #74743
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rename file and wrap long parameter list #74735
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Modify MergedNamespaceDeclaration.MakeChildren to to allocate less #74698
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add span type inference #74646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Add support in DevKit for source link go to definition #74626
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CODE_STYLE workarounds #74697
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
